mapper.select: SELECT p.postno "postNo", p.posttitle "postTitle", to_char(p.regdate, 'yyyy/mm/dd') "regDate" FROM category c left outer join post p ON p.cateno = c.cateno WHERE id = #{id} AND c.cateno = #{cateNo} ORDER BY p.postno desc
SELECT max(p.postNo) FROM category c left outer join post p on p.cateno = c.cateno where c.cateno = #{recentCateNo}
